title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 63.5 - License as a pharmacist by endorsement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 63.5 - License as a pharmacist by endorsement

State Regulations

Effective January 1, 2022, an applicant for licensure as a
pharmacist by endorsement of a pharmacist license issued by another
jurisdiction shall: (a) present
evidence of having met all requirements of 59.6 of this Title, except for the
experience requirement in paragraph (b) of 59.6 of this Title; and
(b) pass an examination of the laws, rules, regulations, and professional conduct pertaining to the practice of pharmacy in

New York acceptable to the board of pharmacy for licensure purposes and
determined by the department to be satisfactory for this purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
63.5

Amended

New

York State Register December 29, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 52, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
